1:
A woman with her baby went into the forest. 
She went to pick fruit.
2: In the forest she found a tree with ripe fruit.
3: She put down her sleeping baby and climbed the tree.
4:
An erotot from another community came by. 
He saw the baby. 
He was surprised. 
He asked himself, "Where is the mother?"
5:
He bent down. 
The sound of the chains on his neck woke the baby.
6:
He let the baby play with his chains. 
The baby laughed as he played.
7:
The woman looked down to see why the baby was laughing. 
She saw the stranger.
8: She was so afraid that she dropped her bag of fruit.
9:
The erotot looked up. 
He said, "Don’t be afraid. I’m only playing with your beautiful baby."
10: So the woman came down from the tree.
11:
The erotot took off one of his chains. 
He gave it to the baby. 
"Here is a gift for you," he said.
12: "Go home with your baby. Tell your husband to move to a more peaceful village. Your baby has given me peace," said the erotot.
